description: Variation of Conditions 1 and 16 of planning permission dated 23 July 2015 (ref. 15/02280/FULL) for Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 19 December 2014 (RN: 14/00789) for demolition of 12 - 13 Bruton Street and erection of an eight storey (plus basement) building comprising dual/alternative retail (Class A1) or restaurant use (Class A3) at ground floor and basement level and office use (Class B1) at first to seventh floor levels. Provision of plant and cycle storage at basement level and plant and photovoltaic panels at seventh floor roof level, namely, design alterations to the facades including the installation of entrance canopies and changes to the shopfronts; installation of Juliette balconies to the windows in the lightwell and alterations to the plant and enclosure at roof level (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
